Introduction

Queen B'Z (Korean: 퀸비즈; Japanese: クイーンビーズ) was a five-member girl group under JS Entertainment. They made their debut as P.O.P Con on October 16, 2012, with the single "Nol Ja Go".
They presumably disbanded in 2017.

Current state:
